sentences.sentence: Superfluous wealth can buy superfluities only.
sentences.translation: 多余的财富购买的只是多余。

sentences.sentence: It is one of those superfluities which the great French wit defined as "things that are very necessary".
sentences.translation: 伟大的法国智者称盐是非常必要的生活用品之一。

sentences.sentence: The older men gradually discard superfluities . The younger men do not ignore the necessary devices of the past.
sentences.translation: 老人们逐渐地丢弃自己的奢侈品，年轻人也不再忽视过去的一些必要的手段。
